duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead safety programs, ensure safety training, and enforce safety procedures to create a safe work environment.
Develop and implement technical, professional, and leadership development plans for team leads and assistant managers.
Utilize coaching, teaching, and training to develop successful team members and drive employee initiatives.
Create and implement staffing strategies, develop and maintain contingency plans, and assess performance of associates.
Direct daily operations, monitor productivity and quality, and ensure safety, inventory accuracy, and on-time deliveries.
Plan, organize, and monitor the receiving, storage, assembly, and distribution of all items received from vendors.
Ensure inventory accuracy, perform relocation and consolidation of product, and monitor the performance of the distribution center.
Ensure proper control, maintenance, protection, and utilization of the company’s physical assets.
Manage and administer distribution center budget, and ensure all records and reports are prepared and effectively maintained.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Business, Logistics, or related field (Bachelor’s degree preferred)
